definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
eosinophil granulocyte (type of white blood cell)

pinyin: shi4 suan1 xing4 li4 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: Roses will not root in such acid soil.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰在這種酸性土壤中不會生根。

sentences.english: The beetle contains a caustic acid-like juice called cantharidin.
sentences.chinese: 該甲蟲體內含有一種腐蝕性的酸性液體，名爲斑蝥素。

sentences.english: Induced accumulation of the acidic pathogenesis-related proteins ( PRs ) in tobacco leaves by ningnanmycin was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了寧南黴素對菸草酸性病程相關蛋白的誘導表達。

sentences.english: Pecin can be used as a stabiliser in the acidified milk drinks.
sentences.chinese: 果膠可用於酸性乳飲料中作爲穩定劑。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding of the radioactive charcteristics of vertebral eosinophilic granuloma.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了提高對脊椎骨嗜酸性肉芽腫的認識。

sentences.english: Tea polysaccharide is a kind of acid mucopolysaccharide, has the significant effect on reducing blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 茶葉多糖是一種酸性粘多糖，具有顯著降血糖效果。

sentences.english: The mucous cells secrete acid mucopolysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 黏液細胞分泌酸性黏多糖。

sentences.english: The solution is acid potassium ion aqua.
sentences.chinese: 該溶液是酸性的含鉀離子水溶液。

sentences.english: The tested sewage sludge is acid.
The distribution area is mainly the acid yellow soil, and associated species is mainly masson's pine.
sentences.chinese: 分佈區主要爲黃壤類酸性土，伴生樹種主要爲馬尾松。

sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接觸輝光放電等離子體降解水體中的酸性品紅。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the soils are acid, low base saturation and of rich organic matter and nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 土壤爲酸性，鹽基飽和度低，富含有機質及氮素。

sentences.english: Sodas with caffeine and those that are acidic are even worse.
sentences.chinese: 含咖啡因的汽水或是酸性的汽水更是不能喝。

sentences.english: The major components of acidic fraction are phenols and organic acids.
sentences.chinese: 酸性組分主要由酚類化合物和有機羧酸組成。

sentences.english: This happens because silver undergoes a chemical reaction with sulfur particles in the air.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲銀與空氣中的酸性物質進行了化學反應。

sentences.english: But also often acid plagioclase was red meat.
sentences.chinese: 而且酸性斜長石也常呈肉紅色。
